title: 3 Bedroom House for Sale at Thalawathugoda
details:
REF NO : HFS0090

3 Bedroom House for Sale at Thalawathugoda

- The land is seven perches
- 3 Bed rooms
- 3 attached bathrooms.
- Maids room
- Wash room.
- High quality pantry cupboards.
- Over 2400 sq with a
- Roof top garden.
- Situated in a prime resident area.
- Remote gate
- Landscape garden.

Price expected is 21 million.
